layman_description: Whether this headgear covers your character's facial hair.
technical_description: Facial hair visibility override for cosmetic model rendering.
player_impact: Some masks hide your beard, others leave it visible.

layman_description: Whether the quality level is shown in item tooltips and inventory.
technical_description: Boolean flag enabling quality tier UI rendering.
player_impact: Lets you see at a glance if an item is worn or in perfect condition.

layman_description: How bright this item glows if you're holding a light source like a torch or flashlight.
technical_description: Radiance value for dynamic light emission during equipment use.
player_impact: Determines how far you can see in the dark with this item.

layman_description: Which quest this item starts or completes when you pick it up.
technical_description: Quest entity reference for objective completion triggers.
player_impact: Some items automatically progress quests when acquired.

layman_description: Whether this item has a built-in light that can be turned on.
technical_description: References activatable light component for item emission.
player_impact: Some weapons and tools have lights you can toggle on and off.

layman_description: What feature or light this item activates when you use it.
technical_description: Component reference for item activation behavior.
player_impact: Determines what happens when you press the activate button for this item.

layman_description: Whether you can attach a tactical flashlight to this weapon.
technical_description: References compatible attachment point for tactical equipment.
player_impact: Lets you add lights to weapons for better night visibility.

layman_description: Other items that can be attached to this one for extra functions.
technical_description: Whitelist of compatible attachment entity references.
player_impact: Lets you customize weapons with scopes, lights, and other gear.

layman_description: What color this block displays from the game's color palette options.
technical_description: Texture page index for color variant selection in rendering.
player_impact: Affects the visual appearance of the block among variants.

layman_description: Which surface texture or pattern this block uses.
technical_description: Texture atlas reference for surface detail application.
player_impact: Determines how worn or pristine the block looks visually.

layman_description: Whether this weapon never runs out of ammunition.
technical_description: Boolean flag disabling ammunition consumption on firing.
player_impact: Creative mode weapons don't need ammo replenishment.

layman_description: How big thrown projectiles are when using this item.
technical_description: Radius value for spherical collision detection on thrown items.
player_impact: Bigger projectiles are easier to aim but less precise.

layman_description: How fast projectiles travel when thrown from this item.
technical_description: Initial velocity magnitude for thrown item physics.
player_impact: Faster projectiles travel further and hit harder.

layman_description: How much gravity affects thrown projectiles from this item.
technical_description: Acceleration constant for projectile physics simulation.
player_impact: Heavy projectiles fall quickly, light ones arc further.

layman_description: How long a thrown projectile stays active before disappearing.
technical_description: Time value for projectile expiration timer.
player_impact: Projectiles that stay active longer can travel further.

layman_description: How long an item stays in the air after being thrown.
technical_description: Duration for airborne projectile state persistence.
player_impact: Affects the arc and distance of thrown items.

layman_description: How hard you throw this item by default.
technical_description: Base throw force applied to projectiles on activation.
player_impact: Determines throw distance without any skill modifiers.

layman_description: Whether this thrown item sticks to surfaces it hits.
technical_description: Boolean flag for adhesive impact behavior on collision.
player_impact: Sticky items stay where you throw them instead of bouncing.

layman_description: How far from a surface a sticky item appears when it sticks.
technical_description: Distance offset from impact surface for sticky item positioning.
player_impact: Affects how far stuck items protrude from walls.

layman_description: How much zombies can smell this item from a distance.
technical_description: Olfactory property value for zombie AI sensory detection.
player_impact: Some items attract more zombies than others when used.
